params.taskDescription: If Timmy Turner is 10 years old and Poof is not a baby fairy, then Timmy Turner has fairly odd parents.

params.notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!

params.taskDescription: Cosmos and Wanda will not grant Timmy’s wishes if and only if Timmy Turner is 10 years old or he does not have fairly odd parents.

questionSetStimulus:
Assume the following statements are true. <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo>:</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p{:}</annotation></semantics></math> “Poof is a baby fairy,” <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>q</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo>:</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">q{:}</annotation></semantics></math> “Timmy Turner has fairly odd parents,” <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo>:</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r{:}</annotation></semantics></math> “Cosmo and Wanda will grant Timmy’s wishes,” and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>t</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo>:</mo>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">t{:}</annotation></semantics></math> “Timmy Turner is 10 years old.” Translate each of the following statements into symbolic form, then determine its truth value.
